channel.title: Other on Kulin Shah
channel.description: Recent content in Other on Kulin Shah

item.title: Concurrent Voting Mechanism
item.description: A concurrent process of voting where the threads representing evms, voters and booths run concurrently using conditional variables and mutex locks. Implementation Details Creating thread for each EVM and each voter. Voter thread will call voter function which will wait until he will allocate a EVM to vote. EVM thread will call EVM function. EVM function will generate a random number between 1 to max. capacity of that booth and allocate that many voter to that EVM.

item.title: Go Back N Protocol
item.description: Go-Back N protocol is error detection and error correction algorithm in the communtication between sender and receiver through socket. Implementation Details Created sender and receiver program which can communicate with each other. Go-Back N protocol will detect and correct error in communication between sender and receiver. Test To test Go-Back-N protocol, at the receiver side, I randomly skipped some packets.
